source: # 第3话 警察先生，就是这个人
repaired: # Chapter 3: Officer, It's This Person!

source: 第二天，政近比平常提早约一小时到校。
repaired: The next day, Masachika arrived at school about an hour earlier than usual.

source: 不是基于什么特别重要的原因。
repaired: It wasn't for any particularly important reason.

source: 单纯是他比平常早一小时醒来。
repaired: He simply woke up an hour earlier than usual.

source: 而且政近难得这么清爽起床，预料要是贸然睡回笼觉将会迟迟睡不著，一直赖床到最后睡过头，所以决定乾脆提早上学。
repaired: And since Masachika rarely felt this refreshed upon waking, he anticipated that if he tried to go back to sleep, he'd end up tossing and turning, staying in bed until he overslept completely. So he decided to just head to school early.

source: 另一个原因在于他今天刚好是值日生。
repaired: Another reason was that today happened to be his day to be on duty.

source: 这所学校按照出席编号的顺序，每天由两人担任值日生，两人的座位会安排为相邻而坐。换句话说，政近的值日生搭档是艾莉莎。
repaired: At this school, two students are assigned as duty students each day, based on their attendance numbers, and their seats are arranged next to each other. In other words, Alya was Masachika's duty partner.

source: 政近知道自己是嫌麻烦又怠惰的人，不过会注意避免为别人添麻烦（忘记带课本请艾莉莎借他看，在他心中不属于添麻烦的范围）。
repaired: Masachika knew he was someone who disliked trouble and was lazy, but he made sure not to cause trouble for others (like forgetting his textbook and asking Alya to lend him hers—this didn't count as causing trouble in his mind).

source: 所以再怎么麻烦，他也不会偷懒不做轮值打扫或值日生的工作。即使如此，他也只会做好自己负责的部分，这方面算是政近天生的个性，但他今天心情不太一样。
repaired: So no matter how troublesome it was, he wouldn't slack off on his cleaning or duty responsibilities. Even so, he only did what was strictly his responsibility—this was just Masachika's natural personality—but today he felt different.

source: 「嗯，我做得真完美。」
repaired: "Hmm, I did a perfect job."

source: 政近在讲台环视无人的教室，满意点了点头。
repaired: Masachika looked around the empty classroom from the podium and nodded with satisfaction.

source: 桌椅排列得井然有序，班导要归还众人的笔记本也整齐摆在桌上。
repaired: The desks and chairs were neatly arranged, and the class teacher's notebooks, ready to be returned, were neatly stacked on the desk.

source: 黑板完全没残留粉笔灰，板擦也是乾乾净净的状态。
repaired: The blackboard was completely free of chalk dust, and the eraser was spotless.

source: 这些都是艾莉莎值日时擅自做的事情，原本不在值日生工作的范围，不过政近今天难得早起，所以想试著对她说「咦？你平常做的工作？我都帮你做完了啊？」这种话。
repaired: These were things Alya had done on her own initiative during her duty, which weren't originally part of the duty student's tasks. But since Masachika had gotten up unusually early today, he wanted to try saying to her, "Huh? You usually do this? I already finished it for you!"

source: 政近回到自己座位，等待应该会比平常早到的艾莉莎。
repaired: Masachika returned to his seat, waiting for Alya, who should arrive earlier than usual.

source: 数分钟后，艾莉莎果然来了。她打开教室的门，认出政近之后睁大双眼。
repaired: A few minutes later, Alya indeed arrived. She opened the classroom door, spotted Masachika, and widened her eyes.

source: 「哟，早啊。」
repaired: "Yo, good morning."

source: 「……早安，久世同学。」
repaired: "...Good morning, Masachika-kun."

source: 艾莉莎环视教室，察觉平常自己做的工作都被做完而皱眉，政近露出洋洋得意的笑容对她开口：
repaired: Alya surveyed the classroom, noticed that all the tasks she usually did had already been completed, and frowned. Masachika, wearing a smug smile, said to her:

source: 「我今天早上难得很早起床，闲著没事就把各种工作做完了。」
repaired: "I got up incredibly early this morning, so I just did all sorts of chores while I had nothing else to do."

source: 「……久世同学居然早起，今天难道会下雪吗？」
repaired: "...Masachika-kun actually got up early? Is it going to snow today?"

source: 「艾莉同学，你日语真的很好耶。」
repaired: "Alya-chan, your Japanese is really good."

source: 「小心别在上课的时候睡著啊。」
repaired: "Be careful not to fall asleep during class."

source: 「……我会妥善处理。」
repaired: "...I'll handle it properly."

source: 政近没什么自信如此回应，艾莉莎傻眼般地叹口气，轻声以坚定的语气说：
repaired: Masachika replied somewhat uncertainly, and Alya sighed in disbelief, softly but firmly saying:

source: 「……上午的黑板由我来擦。」
repaired: "...I'll erase the blackboard this morning."

source: 绝对不想欠别人人情的这种态度，使得政近露出苦笑。
repaired: Masachika couldn't help but give a wry smile at this attitude of absolutely refusing to owe anyone a favor.

source: 政近并不是想做人情给她，不过这应该是艾莉莎自身尊严的问题吧。
repaired: Masachika wasn't trying to do her a favor, but this seemed to be a matter of Alya's own pride.

source: 经过一年多的来往，政近知道这种时候说什么都没用，所以也回应「那就拜托了」率直接受她的要求。
repaired: After more than a year of interaction, Masachika knew that saying anything at times like these would be pointless, so he straightforwardly accepted her request, saying, "Then please do it."

source: 对于政近的回应，艾莉莎再度露出不满表情点点头，以有点奇怪的脚步走向座位。
repaired: In response to Masachika's reply, Alya once again nodded with a dissatisfied expression and walked toward her seat with somewhat strange steps.

source: 政近觉得这种走路方式不对劲，发现她的过膝袜是湿的。
repaired: Masachika thought this way of walking was odd and noticed that her knee-high socks were wet.

source: 看向窗外，不用确认就知道户外是晴天。虽然晚上好像下过雨，但现在丝毫没有这种感觉。
repaired: Looking out the window, he didn't even need to confirm—it was clearly sunny outside. Although it seemed to have rained last night, there was no sign of it now.

source: 「你的袜子怎么了？是一脚踩进水洼吗？」
repaired: "What happened to your socks? Did you step into a puddle?"

source: 「不是啦。我又不是你。」
repaired: "No, I didn't. I'm not you."

source: 「你说谁是整年心不在焉的冒失鬼？」
repaired: "Who are you calling a clumsy fool who's always absent-minded?"

source: 「我没说得这么过分……唉，这是被卡车激起水花溅湿的。」
repaired: "I didn't say anything that extreme... Sigh, they got splashed by a truck."

source: 「哎呀呀，真是苦了你啊。」
repaired: "Oh dear, that must have been tough for you."

source: 「总之，走路太靠近马路的我也有责任，我也有备用的袜子所以没关系，对吧？」
repaired: "Anyway, it's also my fault for walking too close to the road. I have spare socks, so it's okay, right?"

source: 虽然嘴里这么说，不过艾莉莎一坐下就不舒服般地臭著脸脱掉室内鞋，然后弯曲右脚踩在椅面边缘，在政近面前脱起过膝袜。
repaired: Although she said this, as soon as Alya sat down, she uncomfortably scowled, took off her indoor shoes, bent her right leg and placed it on the edge of the chair, and began to take off her knee-high socks in front of Masachika.

source: 白色过膝袜包覆的耀眼美腿展露在政近眼前。修长又白得惊人的腿，沐浴在窗外射入的朝阳下闪闪发亮。裙子从打直的腿上滑落，大腿稍微从裙襬露出。
repaired: A dazzling pair of legs, encased in white knee-high socks, were revealed before Masachika's eyes. Long, strikingly pale legs, bathed in the morning sunlight streaming through the window, glistened brilliantly. Her skirt slipped down from her straight legs, revealing a glimpse of her thighs beneath the hem.

source: 脱掉湿透的过膝袜，艾莉莎像是沉浸在解放感般地伸直腿，让潮湿的赤裸右腿透气。这副模样令政近觉得看见不该看的东西而移开视线。
repaired: After removing her soaked knee-high socks, Alya stretched out her legs as if immersed in a sense of liberation, letting her damp, bare right leg breathe. This sight made Masachika feel as though he had seen something he shouldn't have and quickly averted his gaze.

source: 明明只是脱下过膝袜，却像是偷窥换衣服或入浴般冒出奇妙的罪恶感。政近如今强烈意识到艾莉莎是绝世美少女，突然觉得坐立不安。
repaired: Even though she had merely taken off her knee-high socks, it evoked a strange sense of guilt, akin to peeking at someone changing clothes or taking a bath. Masachika now acutely realized that Alya was an exceptionally beautiful girl and suddenly felt restless.

source: 艾莉莎脱掉双腿的过膝袜，以随身携带在雨天使用的小毛巾擦乾双腿之后，一脸舒坦地吐气。
repaired: Alya removed the knee-high socks from both legs, dried her legs with a small towel she carried for rainy days, and then let out a relieved sigh.

source: 不经意看向旁边，发现政近就这么面向这里挂著尴尬表情看著斜下方，使她感到诧异。
repaired: She casually glanced to the side and was surprised to see Masachika facing this way, wearing an awkward expression and looking downward.

source: 平常从容不迫，凡事都不为所动的政近，露出害臊般脸红心跳的表情……看见这一幕的艾莉莎，嘴角浮现不安好心的笑容。
repaired: Masachika, usually calm and unflappable, showing no reaction to anything, now wore a flushed, heart-pounding expression of embarrassment... Seeing this, Alya's lips curled into an uneasy, mischievous smile.

source: 艾莉莎露出像是喜欢整人的恶作剧表情，重新朝向政近伸出右腿，以大拇趾与食趾俐落夹住政近的裤子使力拉扯。
repaired: Alya, wearing an expression like someone about to play a prank, turned back toward Masachika, extended her right leg, and nimbly pinched the fabric of Masachika's pants between her big toe and index toe, pulling hard.

source: 「欸，可以帮我去置物柜拿备用的袜子吗？」
repaired: "Hey, could you please go to my locker and get my spare socks?"
"Huh?"

source: 「我先脱掉了，没办法自己去拿。」
repaired: "I've already taken mine off, so I can't get them myself."

source: 然后像是暗示「你看了就知道吧？」，就这么让趾尖腾空，俐落交叠双腿。
repaired: Then, as if hinting, "You'll understand when you see it," she lifted her toes into the air and neatly crossed her legs.

source: 这一瞬间，差点就可以从正面看见绝对领域，政近也藏不住慌张而移开视线。
repaired: At that moment, Masachika almost caught a direct view of her absolute zone and couldn't hide his fluster, quickly averting his gaze.

source: 看著他的反应，艾莉莎的整人笑容愈来愈明显，手肘撑在椅背托腮。
repaired: Seeing his reaction, Alya's mischievous smile grew even more pronounced, and she rested her elbow on the back of the chair, propping up her chin.

source: 背对朝阳愉快微笑的倩影美丽如画。
repaired: Her silhouette, smiling happily against the morning sun, was picture-perfect.

source: 简直是对仆人开出无解难题来找乐子的任性公主。或是对部下提出无理要求的反派女干部。
repaired: It was just like a spoiled princess posing an unsolvable puzzle to her servant for amusement, or a villainous female boss making unreasonable demands of her subordinate.

source: （无论是礼服还是军服，艾莉穿起来应该都很合适吧～～）
repaired: (Whether it's a formal gown or a military uniform, Alya would look equally stunning in either~)

source: 政近像这样让思绪飞往毫不相干的方向，匆忙起身前往教室后方的艾莉莎置物柜。
repaired: Masachika, letting his thoughts drift in completely unrelated directions, hurriedly stood up and headed toward Alya's locker at the back of the classroom.

source: 以视线向艾莉莎确认之后打开柜子一看，里面是整理得一丝不苟的各种课本与工具箱。
repaired: After confirming with his gaze, he opened the locker and found it filled with neatly organized textbooks and toolboxes.

source: 深处的折叠伞下方，以透明塑胶袋装著袜子。
repaired: At the bottom, under a folded umbrella, were socks stored in a clear plastic bag.

source: 政近再度莫名觉得自己在做什么不该做的事，连同塑胶袋抓住袜子拿出来，匆忙回到自己的座位。
repaired: Masachika once again inexplicably felt as though he was doing something he shouldn't, grabbed the socks along with the plastic bag, and hurried back to his seat.

source: 「拿去。」
repaired: "Here you go."

source: 然后他看著艾莉莎脸蛋旁边的空间递出袜子之后，艾莉莎倚靠在窗缘开口扔出震撼弹。
repaired: He handed the socks over, placing them beside Alya's face, and Alya, leaning against the window frame, dropped a bombshell.

source: 「那么，帮我穿吧？」
repaired: "So, will you help me put them on?"
"What?"

source: 政近发出怪声转头一看，艾莉莎朝他抬起右腿。
repaired: Masachika let out a strange sound and turned around to see Alya raising her right leg toward him.

source: 大概因为教室只有他们两人，艾莉莎和往常不同，完全没隐藏看好戏的心情，挂著坏心眼的笑容歪过脑袋。
repaired: Perhaps because they were the only two in the classroom, Alya, unlike usual, showed no sign of hiding her amusement, tilting her head with a mischievous smile.

source: 「怎么了？」
repaired: "What's wrong?"

source: 「不对，居然问我怎么了，我才想问你怎么了？」
repaired: "No, you're asking me what's wrong? I should be asking you what's wrong!"

source: 「这是你帮我拿袜子的谢礼。这对你来说是奖赏吧？」
repaired: "This is my thank-you for getting my socks for me. Isn't this a reward for you?"

source: 「不对，把这种事当成奖赏的人，只有一部分特殊的……」
repaired: "No, only a very special kind of person would consider something like this a reward..."

source: 「哎呀，不是吗？」
repaired: "Oh, isn't it?"

source: 艾莉莎一脸意外般地双手抱胸，再度重新交叠双腿，政近猛然转头移开视线大喊：「不！这是奖赏～～！」
repaired: Alya, looking surprised, crossed her arms and once again neatly crossed her legs, causing Masachika to sharply turn his head, avert his gaze, and shout, "No! This is a reward~!"

source: 政近原本想继续说：「够了吧！拜托饶了我吧！」……但是还没开口，艾莉莎轻声说出的俄语就传入他的耳朵。
repaired: Masachika had originally intended to continue, "That's enough! Please spare me!"... but before he could speak, Alya's softly spoken Russian words reached his ears.

source: 【不过对我来说也是。】
repaired: 【But it's the same for me too.】

source: 斜眼瞥向艾莉莎，直到刚才的恶作剧表情消失无踪。
repaired: He glanced sideways at Alya, and the mischievous expression from just moments ago had completely vanished.

source: 艾莉莎不自觉地脸红，玩弄头发移开视线。看到这副表情，政近的大脑朝著奇怪的方向全速运作。
repaired: Alya unconsciously blushed, played with her hair, and averted her gaze. Seeing this expression, Masachika's brain went into overdrive in a strange direction.

source: 艾莉莎以俄语遮羞的行为是怎么回事？
repaired: What was going on with Alya's behavior of covering herself with Russian?

source: 政近从以前就在思考这个问题。后来他得出「艾莉或许是心理层面的暴露狂」这个结论。
repaired: Masachika had been pondering this question for a long time. Eventually, he concluded that "Alya might be a psychological exhibitionist."

source: 艾莉莎是完美主义的努力派。为了成为心目中理想的自己，她总是严以律己，不断努力。
repaired: Alya was a perfectionist and a hard worker. To become the ideal version of herself, she was always strict with herself and constantly striving.

source: 不过，愈是在平常压抑自己的人，愈容易找管道宣泄内心累积的压力。政近在某处听过这种事。
repaired: However, the more one suppresses oneself in everyday life, the easier it is to find an outlet for the accumulated stress within. Masachika had heard this somewhere before.

source: 而对于艾莉莎来说，以俄语遮羞的这种行为正是在宣泄压力吧。
repaired: And for Alya, this behavior of covering herself with Russian was precisely a way to release her stress.

source: 如同不穿内衣出现在公众场所的暴露狂，或许她在别人面前说出害臊的话语，是要享受可能被拆穿真相的惊险刺激感。
repaired: Like an exhibitionist who appears in public without underwear, perhaps speaking embarrassing words in front of others was her way of enjoying the thrill of potentially being exposed.

source: 政近是这么推测的。换言之，他想表达的意思是……
repaired: That was Masachika's speculation. In other words, what he meant was...

source: （既然是你情我愿就没问题了！）
repaired: (As long as it's consensual, it's fine!)

source: 按照政近的理论，艾莉莎是享受害羞感觉的人种。换句话说艾莉莎会开心，他也会开心。是的，这是双赢的关系！
repaired: According to Masachika's theory, Alya was someone who enjoyed feeling shy. In other words, Alya would be happy, and he would be happy too. Yes, it was a win-win relationship!

source: ……如果别人听到这种说法，肯定接连说出「这是哪门子的逻辑？」「心理层面的暴露狂是什么？」「犯罪的每个人都说是你情我愿喔」等各种吐槽，不过说来悲哀，政近的脑中没人负责吐槽。
repaired: ......If others heard this, they'd surely respond with a barrage of吐槽 like, "What kind of logic is that?" "What's a psychological exhibitionist?" "Everyone who commits a crime claims it was consensual!" Sadly, there was no one in Masachika's brain to deliver those critiques.

source: 但是政近在这个阶段依然在犹豫。虽说是你情我愿，却是以俄语成立的。这时候还是希望以日语徵得许可。
repaired: But even at this stage, Masachika was still hesitating. Although it was consensual, it was established through Russian. At this point, he still hoped to obtain permission in Japanese.

source: 「你刚才说什么？」
repaired: "What did you just say?"

source: 基于邪恶至极的这个构想，政近重新面向正前方询问。艾莉莎随即露出挑衅的笑，以政近预先猜测到的方式掩饰。
repaired: Based on this utterly wicked idea, Masachika turned back to face forward and asked again. Alya immediately responded with a provocative smile, masking her words in the very way Masachika had anticipated.

source: 「没有啊？我只是说『你这个窝囊废』。」
repaired: "Huh? I didn't say anything. I just called you a 'loser.'"

source: 我就是在等你这句话。政近在内心振臂握拳，露出深感遗憾的表情。艾莉莎对他露出瞧不起的笑容，解开交叠的双腿。
repaired: "That's exactly what I was waiting for!" Masachika cheered inwardly, pumping his fist and putting on a deeply regretful expression. Alya gave him a dismissive smile and uncrossed her legs.

source: 「哎，算了。我自己穿──」
repaired: "Oh, forget it. I'll just put them on myself—"

source: 「不，没这个必要。」
repaired: "No, that's not necessary."

source: 艾莉莎正要收回袜子的时候，政近拿著袜子当场跪下，使得艾莉莎一脸诧异。
repaired: Just as Alya was about to pull her socks back, Masachika knelt down right there, holding the socks, leaving Alya utterly astonished.

source: 不过在下一瞬间，右腿被政近伸手扶住，她大幅睁开双眼。
repaired: But the next instant, her right leg was gently supported by Masachika's hand, causing her eyes to widen dramatically.

source: 「呀啊？」
repaired: "Ah!"

source: 别人的指尖从脚跟撩到脚踝，酥痒又不舒服的这种感觉，使得艾莉莎惊声尖叫。右腿反射性地往上弹，她连忙按住裙子。
repaired: The sensation of someone's fingertips brushing from her heel to her ankle—a tingling, uncomfortable feeling—made Alya scream in surprise. Her right leg reflexively shot upward, and she quickly clutched at her skirt.

source: 「喂喂喂，别乱动啦。」
repaired: "Hey, hey, stop moving around!"

source: 「要……要我别乱动……啊，等一下──！」
repaired: "Y-you're telling me not to move... Ah, wait—!"

source: 差点发出奇怪的声音，艾莉莎就这么以右手按住裙子，迅速以左手捂嘴。
repaired: On the verge of letting out a strange sound, Alya pressed her right hand against her skirt and swiftly covered her mouth with her left.

source: 政近傻眼看著这样的艾莉莎，嘴角露出诡计得逞的笑容开口说：
repaired: Masachika stared dumbfounded at Alya, a sly smile spreading across his lips as he said:

source: 「怎么了，是你叫我帮你穿吧？」
repaired: "What's wrong? Didn't you ask me to help you put them on?"

source: 「是……没错啦，可是──！」
repaired: "Y-yes... but—!"

source: 「被你说成窝囊废，我终究还是有尊严要顾的。」
repaired: "Being called a loser—it still matters to my pride, after all."

source: 「等一下，我还没做好心理准备──」
repaired: "Wait, I'm not ready yet—"

source: 但是政近对艾莉莎这句话不以为意，双手拇指撑开袜口，轻轻将袜子套在艾莉莎脚上。
repaired: But Masachika disregarded Alya's protest, using both thumbs to stretch open the sock's opening and gently pulling the sock onto Alya's foot.

source: 袜子从趾尖往上爬的触感，彷佛有一道电流窜上艾莉莎的背脊。
repaired: The sensation of the sock creeping up from her toes felt like an electric current running up Alya's spine.
"Aah, don't—!"

source: 然后，政近的拇指隔著袜子的薄布碰到艾莉莎的大腿──
repaired: Then, Masachika's thumb touched Alya's thigh through the thin fabric of the sock—

source: 「～～你在摸哪里啊！」
repaired: "Wh-where are you touching me?!"

source: 「啊噗嘶！」
repaired: "Agh!"

source: 艾莉莎的腿情急之下往上踢，漂亮命中政近的下巴。政近就这么跌坐在地，后脑勺用力撞上自己的椅子。
repaired: Alya's leg instinctively kicked upward, landing a perfect strike on Masachika's chin. Masachika fell backward, his head slamming hard into his chair.
"Ugh—!"

source: 「啊，对……对不起。还好吗？」
repaired: "Ah, I'm... I'm sorry. Are you okay?"

source: 看著政近倒地蜷缩抱头痛得要命，艾莉莎内心的担忧终究盖过其他情绪，暂时忘记害羞与愤怒表达关心之意。政近在她面前朝著地板颤抖伸出右手，食指抚过地板。
repaired: Watching Masachika lying on the floor, curled up and clutching his head in agony, Alya's concern ultimately overwhelmed her other emotions, momentarily forgetting her embarrassment and anger as she expressed her worry. Masachika, before her, trembled as he reached out his right hand toward the floor, his index finger tracing across it.

source: 就像是以自身鲜血写下死前讯息的濒死伤患。
repaired: It was as if he were a dying patient writing his final message in his own blood.

source: 实际上政近的手指头没沾血，就只是指尖抚过地板，不过艾莉莎却清楚看见政近想写的字。
repaired: In reality, Masachika's fingers weren't stained with blood; his fingertip merely brushed across the floor, yet Alya clearly saw the words Masachika intended to write.

source: 简单的「粉红色」三个字。
repaired: Three simple characters: "pink."

source: 认出这三个字的瞬间，艾莉莎猛然按住自己的裙子。脸蛋立刻因为愤怒与害羞而通红。
repaired: The moment she recognized these three characters, Alya abruptly clutched at her skirt, her face instantly flushing red with anger and embarrassment.
"Ugh... you—ugh—!"

source: 大概是不知道如何将怒火宣泄在倒地的政近，艾莉莎反覆开阖右手，暂时发出不成声的声音，接著慢慢抓起政近桌上的另一条袜子，迅速套在左腿。
repaired: Not knowing how to vent her fury on the fallen Masachika, Alya repeatedly opened and closed her right hand, emitting inarticulate sounds for a moment, then quickly grabbed another sock from Masachika's desk and swiftly pulled it onto her left leg.

source: 等到双脚穿上室内鞋之后，她以俄语朝著依然死在地上的政近大喊：
repaired: Once both feet were clad in indoor shoes, she shouted in Russian at Masachika, who was still lying motionless on the floor:

source: 【真是不敢相信！笨蛋！去死吧！】
repaired: 【I can't believe it! You idiot! Go die!】

source: 艾莉莎像是孩童般地怒骂之后，以粗鲁的脚步走出教室。刚好在这时候要进入教室的两名女同学，被艾莉莎非比寻常的模样吓到，连忙让路。
repaired: After scolding Masachika like a child, Alya strode out of the classroom with rough steps. Just at that moment, two female classmates entering the classroom were startled by Alya's unusual appearance and quickly stepped aside.

source: 「咦？什么？艾莉公主刚才好像叫了好大一声？」
repaired: "Huh? What? Did Princess Alya just scream so loudly?"

source: 「那是俄语吧？怎么回事？咦？公主大人神智错乱了？」
repaired: "That was Russian, wasn't it? What's going on? Huh? Has the princess lost her mind?"

source: 两人一起露出错愕表情目送艾莉莎的背影，然后不经意看向教室，发现正在揉著后脑勺的政近。
repaired: The two exchanged shocked expressions as they watched Alya's retreating figure, then inadvertently glanced toward the classroom and spotted Masachika rubbing the back of his head.

source: 「早安，久世……发生了什么事？」
repaired: "Good morning, Masachika... What happened?"

source: 「啊啊，早安……不，没什么。」
repaired: "Ah, good morning... No, nothing."

source: 「早安，久世同学……你的头怎么了？」
repaired: "Good morning, Masachika... What's wrong with your head?"

source: 「没有啦……总觉得这个部位好像冒了痘痘。」
repaired: "Oh, it's nothing... Just feels like a pimple popped up here."

source: 两人狐疑歪过脑袋，坐在自己的座位。政近假装没察觉这两人的疑惑视线，拿出手机开启简讯应用程式，传讯息给妹妹。
repaired: The two tilted their heads in suspicion and sat down at their seats. Masachika pretended not to notice their questioning gazes, took out his phone, opened the messaging app, and sent a message to his younger sister.

source: 『老妹啊，大事不妙。』
repaired: "Sis, this is serious."

source: 她大概正在搭车上学，讯息立刻变成已读，传来回应。
repaired: She was probably on her way to school by bus, and the message was immediately marked as read, with a reply coming back quickly.

source: 『我亲爱的哥哥大人，怎么了？』
repaired: "My dear brother, what's wrong?"

source: 『听完别吓到啊，其实……』
repaired: "Don't be scared when you hear this, but..."

source: 『洗耳恭听。』
repaired: "I'm all ears."

source: 她传来一张战栗发抖的动画角色贴图。政近看著充满紧张感的这张贴图，以一副痛恨至极的表情输入讯息。
repaired: She sent back an animated sticker of a character shivering with fear. Masachika, looking at this intensely tense sticker, typed out a message with an expression of utter disgust.

source: 『我……说不定是腿控。』
repaired: "I... might be a leg fetishist."

source: 『你说什么……？你这家伙不是道地的奶子星人吗？』
repaired: "What are you saying...? Aren't you a die-hard boob person?"

source: 『是啊……唔！没想到我居然有这种癖好！』
repaired: "Yes... Ugh! Who would've thought I'd have such a fetish!"

source: 『这样啊……看来你终于明白腿的美妙了……』
repaired: "So that's how it is... It seems you've finally understood the beauty of legs..."

source: 『好像是。』
repaired: "Looks like it."

source: 『腿很棒啊？虽然肉肉的大腿很赞，不过锻炼过像是羚羊的健美双腿也难以抗拒。』
repaired: "Legs are amazing, aren't they? While plump thighs are wonderful, well-toned legs like an antelope's are also irresistible."

source: 『喔喔，老妹你真是了不起。』
repaired: "Wow, sis, you're incredible."

source: 『嗯……话说老哥。』
repaired: "Hmm... By the way, bro."
"Hmm?"

source: 『这是什么白痴对话？』
repaired: "What kind of idiotic conversation is this?"

source: 『抱歉。』
repaired: "Sorry."

source: 隔著手机被妹妹泼冷水，政近表情变得严肃。他收起手机，无力趴在桌上。
repaired: Receiving a cold splash from his sister over the phone, Masachika's expression grew serious. He put away his phone and slumped lifelessly onto the desk.

source: 「这下子怎么办呢……」
repaired: "What am I going to do now..."

source: 政近自己也知道刚才在各方面做得太过火了。感觉最好现在就去道歉，不过艾莉莎自尊心那么强，要是现在贸然前去道歉，可能反而会令她态度更加强硬。
repaired: Masachika himself knew he'd gone too far in every respect just now. He felt it would be best to apologize right away, but Alya's pride was so strong that rushing to apologize now might only make her even more stubborn.

source: 「哎，等她回来再思考吧。」
repaired: "Ah, let's think about it when she gets back."

source: 艾莉莎也不是孩子了。等她冷静之后，或许会意外以一如往常的样子回座。
repaired: Alya wasn't a child anymore. Once she calmed down, she might surprisingly return to her seat as usual.

source: 先说结论，不是政近想的那样。
repaired: To state the conclusion first, it wasn't at all what Masachika had imagined.

source: 「呃～～那么今天要通知的事情说完了。啊啊，敬礼就免了，再见。」
repaired: "Um... Well, that's all the announcements for today. Oh, salutes are unnecessary, goodbye."

source: 班导迅速说完之后匆忙离开教室。早上的班会时间很快结束，所以距离第一节课还有将近五分钟的时间。
repaired: The homeroom teacher finished speaking quickly and hurried out of the classroom. Morning homeroom ended so swiftly that there were still nearly five minutes until the first class.

source: 不过，一年B班的学生们没人离席，只听到有人开始压低声音悄悄讨论某些事。老师之所以提早结束班会时间，学生们之所以有点紧张，原因只有一个。
repaired: However, none of the students in Class 1-B left their seats; instead, some began quietly lowering their voices to whisper about something. The reason the teacher ended homeroom early and the students were somewhat tense was only one thing.

source: 因为我们的艾莉公主一改平常的扑克脸，托腮板著脸彻底释放不悦气场。
repaired: Because our Princess Alya had abandoned her usual poker face, resting her cheek on her hand and completely unleashing her displeased aura.

source: 「（欸，我问你……那边是发生了什么事？）」
repaired: "Hey, tell me... What's going on over there?"

source: 「（不知道……不过听说是和久世同学有关。）」
repaired: "I don't know... But I heard it has something to do with Masachika."

source: 「（是没错啦，艾莉同学心情不美丽，只可能是久世同学惹她生气吧。具体来说是发生什么事？）」
repaired: "That's right... Alya's in a terrible mood, so it must be Masachika who upset her. What exactly happened?"

source: 「（我刚才有听到艾莉公主放声大喊耶？）」
repaired: "I just heard Alya screaming at the top of her lungs!"

source: 「（咦？她说了什么？）」
repaired: "Huh? What did she say?"

source: 「（天晓得？她说俄语所以听不懂。）」
repaired: "Heaven knows? She spoke Russian, so I couldn't understand."

source: 教室各处轻声传来各种臆测，毅在这种状况下悄悄离座，弯著腰偷偷去找政近。
repaired: Various speculations whispered softly throughout the classroom, and under these circumstances, Tsuyoshi quietly left his seat, bent over, and stealthily approached Masachika.
"Hey, tell me..."

source: 「（什么事啊？）」
repaired: "What's up?"

source: 政近慑于周围的气氛，不自觉同样轻声回应。毅随即将嘴凑到政近耳边打耳语。
repaired: Intimidated by the atmosphere around him, Masachika unconsciously responded in a similarly hushed tone. Tsuyoshi then leaned close to Masachika's ear and whispered:

source: 「（听说你惹艾莉同学生气之后挨了延髓斩，真的吗？）」
repaired: "I heard you got hit with a medulla oblongata kick after upsetting Alya. Is that true?"

source: 「为什么变成这样？」
repaired: "How did it come to this?"

source: 政近忍不住大叫，被艾莉莎狠狠一瞪就缩起脖子。
repaired: Masachika couldn't help but exclaim, shrinking his neck under Alya's fierce glare.

source: 顺带一提，「延髓斩」是跳起来朝对方后脑勺攻击的回旋踢。
repaired: By the way, a "medulla oblongata kick" is a spinning kick aimed at the back of the opponent's head.

source: 即使是坏孩子也绝对不能模仿这种招式。
repaired: Even bad kids should never imitate this move.

source: 「（艾莉不可能使用这么危险的招式吧？）」
repaired: "Alya wouldn't use such a dangerous move, would she?"

source: 「（我……我想也是。）」
repaired: "I... I don't think so either."

source: 「（是啊，顶多只是下颚挨了倒挂金钩踢。）」
repaired: "Yeah, at most she'd get a reverse hook kick to the jaw."

source: 「（慢著，这就某方面来说也很危险吧？）」
repaired: "Wait, isn't that dangerous in its own way?"

source: 毅以为是玩笑话而露出苦笑，政近心想「不过我一半是说真的」含糊一笑。
repaired: Tsuyoshi smiled wryly, thinking it was a joke, while Masachika thought, "But half of it's actually true," and gave a vague smile.

source: 「（所以艾莉公主为什么不高兴到那种程度？）」
repaired: "So why is Princess Alya so upset?"

source: 「（没有啦，那是……）」
repaired: "Oh, it's just that..."

source: 「（反正是你做错事闯祸吧？好啦，给我从实招来！）」
repaired: "You definitely did something wrong and caused trouble, didn't you? Now, confess already!"

source: 「（唔～～总之要说做错确实有做错吧？）」
repaired: "Ugh... Well, I guess I did do something wrong, didn't I?"

source: 老实说，做错事了。闯祸了。不过要是这时候自首「我摸了她的腿还看见内裤」，明显立刻就会接受学年审判并且全票通过公开处刑。
repaired: Honestly, he had done something wrong. He had caused trouble. But if he confessed now, "I touched her leg and saw her underwear," he'd obviously face an immediate year-level trial and unanimous approval for public execution.

source: 所以政近运用话术回避毅的追问，思考有什么方法能让艾莉莎心情变好。
repaired: So Masachika used his verbal skills to evade Tsuyoshi's persistent questioning, pondering how he could cheer Alya up.

source: 「啊啊～～艾莉？」
repaired: "Ah... Alya?"

source: 总之先道歉吧。政近向托腮看向窗外的艾莉莎搭话。然后艾莉莎只将视线移向政近，以恐怖的声音回应：
repaired: First things first—apologize. Masachika spoke to Alya, who was resting her chin on her hand and gazing out the window. Alya merely shifted her gaze toward Masachika and replied in a chilling tone:

source: 「……怎么了，久世同学？」【这个腿控色狼。】
repaired: "...What is it, Kuse-kun?" [You perverted leg fetishist.]

source: 总觉得听到副声道了。她以俄语在「久世同学」旁边加注小字。
repaired: It felt as if he'd heard a subchannel. She'd added small Russian words next to "Kuse-kun."

source: 被她这么说的政近也想大声辩解，但是既然假装听不懂俄语就无法多说什么。
repaired: Hearing this, Masachika wanted to shout his defense, but since he'd pretended not to understand Russian, he couldn't say much.

source: 总之要是反驳说「可惜我是奶子星人」，艾莉莎心中的政近股价肯定创新低，全班女生也会抢著拋售政近股，所以到头来保持沉默应该才是正确答案。
repaired: After all, if he retorted, "Unfortunately, I'm a boob person," Masachika's stock in Alya's eyes would plummet to an all-time low, and every girl in the class would rush to dump their Masachika shares. In the end, silence was probably the right answer.

source: （不过啊～～仔细想想，我做的事情没那么严重吧？）
repaired: "But... when you think about it carefully, what I did wasn't really that serious, was it?"

source: 艾莉莎的冷淡反应，使得政近内心冒出这种想法。
repaired: Alya's cold response triggered this thought within Masachika.

source: 政近摸艾莉莎的腿，原本就是艾莉莎自己的指示，因为害臊而往上踢的也是艾莉莎。
repaired: After all, touching Alya's leg had originally been her own instruction, and it was she herself who kicked upward out of shyness.

source: 看见内裤是不可抗力的结果，后来以死前讯息的方式提醒应该是多此一举，不过这也是贴心暗示自己不在意艾莉莎动粗抵抗……政近不太能接受只有自己被视为错的一方。
repaired: Seeing her underwear was an irresistible force, and reminding her afterward via a "last message" was probably unnecessary—but it was also a considerate hint that she didn't mind his rough resistance... Masachika just couldn't accept being the only one seen as at fault.

source: 不过他知道，男生在这种状况往往屈居劣势，所以决定别乱说话直接道歉。
repaired: However, he knew that boys were often at a disadvantage in such situations, so he decided not to say anything rash and just apologize directly.

source: 「那个，对不起。刚才各方面惹你生气。」
repaired: "Um... I'm sorry. I upset you in various ways just now."

source: 「……我不介意啊？毕竟我也有错，而且我已经没生气了啊？」
repaired: "...I don't really mind, do I? After all, I was also at fault, and I've already gotten over being angry, haven't I?"

source: 政近「那你为什么看起来这么不高兴啊～～」的内心疑问，以及全班同学偷听之后「绝对在说谎……」的内心感想重叠在一起。
repaired: Masachika's inner question, "Then why do you look so unhappy~," overlapped with the classmates' inner thoughts after eavesdropping, "She's definitely lying..."

source: 不过，其实她没说谎。实际上艾莉莎已经没生气了。
repaired: But actually, she wasn't lying. In fact, Alya had already gotten over her anger.

source: 现在艾莉莎的心里，是腿被碰触、内裤被看见的害羞情感。
repaired: What filled Alya's heart now was the shy feeling from having her leg touched and her underwear glimpsed.

source: 不只如此，虽说是因为政近的反应很有趣，不过主动要求「帮我穿吧？」的自身行径也令她害羞。
repaired: Moreover, although it was because Masachika's reaction was so amusing, she was also embarrassed by her own proactive behavior of asking, "Could you help me put them on?"

source: 还有，后来她像是孩童般地大呼小叫，这些行为造成的害羞情感填满艾莉莎的心。如果地上有洞，她好想钻进去封住洞口进行隔音加工之后喊个痛快。
repaired: And then there was her childlike shouting and screaming afterward—these actions further filled Alya's heart with shy feelings. If there were a hole in the ground, she'd want to crawl into it, seal the entrance for soundproofing, and then scream her heart out.

source: 她只是为了不让自己的内心想法显露出来，才会刻意对外散发「我心情不好！」的气场。
repaired: She deliberately projected an aura of "I'm in a bad mood!" outward only to hide what was really going on inside.

source: 不过政近猜不透这种少女心，就只是不知如何是好。
repaired: But Masachika couldn't fathom such a girl's heart and was simply at a loss.

source: 钟声在他犹豫的时候响起，老师进入教室开始上第一节课。
repaired: The bell rang while he was hesitating, and the teacher entered the classroom to begin the first lesson.

source: 「好～～要开始上课了～～那么，值日生九──久世，喊口令吧。」
repaired: "Alright—let's start class—so, duty student nine—Kuse, give the command!"

source: 数学老师确认黑板角落所写的值日生名字，不经意看向艾莉莎，然后自然而然指名政近。
repaired: The math teacher checked the duty student's name written in the corner of the blackboard, casually glanced at Alya, and naturally called on Masachika.

source: （（（我懂这种心情。）））
repaired: (((I understand this feeling.)))

source: 除了某人，班上所有人的心情团结一致。
repaired: Everyone in the class, except for one person, shared the same sentiment.

source: 「……起立，敬礼。老师好～～」
repaired: "...Stand up, bow. Good morning, teacher~."
"Good morning, teacher~."

source: 自然地变得不太自然的招呼打完之后，一直以莫名紧张的气氛上课。
repaired: After exchanging greetings that had become unnaturally natural, the class continued in an inexplicably tense atmosphere.

source: 对于政近来说，早起的弊害果然引得睡魔逐渐接近，不过政近终究没有勇猛到能在这种气氛之中打瞌睡。
repaired: For Masachika, the drawbacks of waking up early were indeed drawing sleep closer, but he wasn't brave enough to doze off in this atmosphere.

source: 就算这么说，他也无法专心上课，专心在脑中摸索讨好公主大人的方法。
repaired: Even so, he couldn't concentrate on the lesson; instead, he was busy brainstorming ways to please the princess in his head.

source: 「那么，今天上到这里……久世，喊口令吧。」
repaired: "So, that's all for today... Kuse, give the command."

source: 「……起立，敬礼。谢谢老师～～」
repaired: "...Stand up, bow. Thank you, teacher~."
"Thank you, teacher~."

source: 数学老师直到最后都坚持不看艾莉莎，就这么离开教室。政近也像是随后跟上般立刻冲出教室，快步前往设置在避难出口外面的自动贩卖机。获得目标商品之后随即掉头回到教室，恭敬献给邻座的艾莉莎。
repaired: The math teacher avoided looking at Alya until the very end and left the classroom. Masachika immediately rushed out of the classroom as if following closely behind, hurrying to the vending machine set up outside the emergency exit. After obtaining his target item, he immediately turned around and returned to the classroom, respectfully presenting it to Alya, his seatmate.

source: 「公主，今天请务必收下这个放过小的一马。」
repaired: "Princess, please accept this today and spare this humble one."

source: 政近说完献出的是……在「征岭学园到底有谁会买的排行榜」堂堂创下连续十四年冠军记录的商品，名为「甜蜜蜜红豆汤」。补充说明一下，内容物可以形容为液状红豆馅，是极度甜腻到口乾舌燥的饮品。
repaired: What Masachika presented was... a product that had proudly held the top spot on the "Who Would Even Buy This at Seirei Academy" chart for fourteen consecutive years, called "Sweet Red Bean Soup." To elaborate, its contents could be described as liquid red bean paste—a drink so intensely sweet it left your mouth parched.

source: （（（为什么是红豆汤？）））
repaired: (((Why red bean soup?)))

source: 班上同学们以「你疯了吗？是在挑衅公主吗？」的眼神看向政近，不过政近知道，艾莉莎常喝这种会让血糖飙高的饮料。
repaired: The classmates looked at Masachika with expressions like, "Are you crazy? Are you provoking the princess?" But Masachika knew that Alya frequently drank this beverage that caused her blood sugar to spike.

source: 「……我刚才不是说我没生气吗？」
repaired: "...Didn't I just say I wasn't angry?"

source: 「是的，您当然说过。小的希望至少用这个表达谢罪的诚意。」
repaired: "Yes, you certainly did. This humble one hopes at least this can convey our sincere apology."

source: 「……总之，我就收下吧。」
repaired: "...Alright, I'll take it."

source: 「谢公主～～」
repaired: "Thank you, Princess~."

source: 不出所料，艾莉莎从政近手中收下这罐饮料，开罐之后一口气喝光。班上纷纷投以战栗的视线。
repaired: As expected, Alya accepted the drink from Masachika, opened the can, and drank it all in one go. The entire class watched with trembling gazes.

source: 「感谢招待。」
repaired: "Thank you for the treat."

source: 「啊，空罐这边会负责处理。」
repaired: "Oh, I'll take care of the empty can."

source: 「这种小事不必了啦。」
repaired: "No need for something so trivial."

source: 「不不不，小的可不能劳烦公主动手。」
repaired: "No, no, no—this humble one can't possibly trouble the princess to do such a thing."

source: 「那就不要演这种奇怪的戏。」
repaired: "Then stop putting on this strange act."

source: 「遵命。」
repaired: "Yes, sir."

source: 虽然语气依然刻薄，政近却觉得艾莉莎散发的气息柔和了些。他对此松了口气，回到自己的座位……然后发现一件严重的事。
repaired: Although her tone remained sharp, Masachika felt that Alya's aura had softened somewhat. He breathed a sigh of relief and returned to his seat... only to discover something serious.

source: （啊，惨了……我没有下一节课的课本。）
repaired: "Oh no... I don't have the textbook for the next class."

source: 以往在这种时候会请艾莉莎借他看。不过要是在这个状况厚脸皮说「课本借我看吧？」这种话，艾莉莎稍微变好的心情或许会急遽恶化。
repaired: In the past, he would have asked Alya to lend it to him. But if he brazenly said, "Can I borrow your textbook?" in this situation, Alya's slightly improved mood might plummet again.

source: 这么一来，全班肯定会朝他投以责备的视线。
repaired: And then the whole class would surely cast reproachful glances at him.

source: （没办法了……）
repaired: (There's no helping it...)

source: 检视书包与抽屉之后僵住的政近，被艾莉莎投以疑惑的视线。政近像是要逃离这双视线般地转头，朝另一侧的女生开口说：
repaired: After stiffening up while checking his schoolbag and desk drawer, Masachika was met with Alya's puzzled gaze. As if trying to escape those eyes, Masachika turned his head and addressed the girl on the other side:

source: 「抱歉，可以借我看一下课本吗？」
repaired: "Sorry, could I borrow your textbook?"

source: 「咦？啊啊……嗯，好。」
repaired: "Huh? Oh... um, sure."

source: 邻座的女生像是猜出端倪般地露出苦笑，爽快点头答应。政近对此心怀谢意，将课桌并过去之后，有惊无险松了口气。紧接著……
repaired: The seatmate, as if guessing what was going on, gave a wry smile and readily agreed. Masachika was deeply grateful and, after pushing the desks together, breathed a sigh of relief without incident. And then...

source: 【花花公子。】
repaired: 【Playboy.】

source: 随著这句俄语的呢喃，教室气氛变得更加冰冷。
repaired: With this whispered word in Russian, the classroom atmosphere grew even colder.

source: （到底要我怎样啦……）
repaired: (What exactly do you want from me...?)

source: 政近的叹息无济于事，这天的一年B班教室，一直维持著莫名紧张的气氛上课。
repaired: Masachika's sighs were futile, and the Year B classroom continued to maintain an inexplicably tense atmosphere throughout the day.
